description:
RealSimpleEDU.com brings you on-the-go learning and reference for Calculus

App offers quizzes and tutorials  to help you learn Calculus

App is continuously updated based on your feedback.Your 100% satisfaction is guaranteed.

App Tools include search .

Includes following tutorials:

Limits and Continuity,
Functions,
Derivatives and Differentiation,
Techniques of Differentiation,
Applications of Derivative,
Integrals and Integration,
Techniques of Integration,
Applications of Integration,
Motion,
Differential Equations,
Parametric Equations and Calculus,
Calculus of Polar Curves,
Power Series,
Microeconomics 1,
Microeconomics 2,
Probability and Statistics.


Includes following quizzes:

Quiz on Differentiation,
Quiz on Integration,
Quiz on Miscellaneous Topics.


Our Vision: Provide on-the-go references that enable our customers to refer, learn and remember; easy to learn, more engaging and most complete.

Our Mission: A RealSimpleEDU app in every pocket.

Please write to us. We would love to improve this app.
versionNote:
App is continuously updated based on your feedback.
